scenario_text.value:
Sorry for the wait, Takuma! We’ll join the
fight, too!
Let’s take them all down together!

Miu! Shakomon! What a relief to see you two
are okay!
Miu ain’t gonna give up that easy!

After that awful dream I had, I woke up on
the wrong side of the bed!

And I HATE waking up on that side! You jerks
are gonna pay for that!

(What? More enemies?! We’re gonna have to
regroup...)
